com.revolsys.jts.testold.generator

Class GeometryGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.jts.testold.generator.GeometryGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GridGenerator, LineStringGenerator, MultiGenerator, PointGenerator, PolygonGenerator

    public abstract class GeometryGenerator
extends Object
    This class illustrates the basic functionality and configuration options for generating spatial data.
    Author:
    David Zwiers, Vivid Solutions.
